attributes.action: Force Jenna Farley to allow Milamber to pull our baby up the aisle at our wedding.
attributes.additional_details:
Unfortunately my fiancee will not allow my Dogue de Bordeaux, Milamber, to pull our baby and pram up the aisle at our wedding.

It is for the benefit of the local community, the County of Cornwall and to this great country itself that the winner of Best in Show Chiverton Dog Show in 2013 should be an important feature at our wedding. In a bow tie. Possibly shoes.

If this petition reaches the sufficient amount of signatures, I expect the government to get involved and give me the rights to make this happen.

Thank you. Dean Pascoe.
